summary: Highly skilled and experienced Big Data Engineer with a strong focus on churn analysis. Proven track record in designing and implementing large-scale data processing systems and predicting customer behavior. Proficient in a variety of data tools and programming languages. Committed to helping businesses make data-driven decisions and improve customer retention.

achievements: Collaborated on machine learning projects within an agile team environment, contributing to the development and implementation of advanced solutions that improved system efficiency by 30%.

Engineered data pipelines utilizing renowned AWS services, driving AI/ML opportunities for telecommunications businesses across Latin America, resulting in a 20% increase in data processing speed and a 15% increase in customer satisfaction.

Fostered close collaboration with business analytics and data scientists to streamline the development of automation strategies, enhancing the efficiency of exploration, feature engineering, and modeling processes.
Leveraged churn analysis and machine learning models to drive strategic decisions in the telecommunications industry, working with various operational companies across Latin America.
Spearheaded the introduction of a comprehensive project management system, leading to a significant enhancement in operational efficiency with a 70% increase in productivity.
Worked in a fast-paced environment with both technology and marketing areas to assess department communication.
Developed and maintained robust data pipelines, ensuring the accuracy and availability of data for key business decisions.
Implemented innovative data modeling techniques, improving the efficiency of data storage and retrieval and facilitating insightful data analysis.
Managed a monolithic full-stack application with 550+ active users and 25+ requests successfully solved.
Developed fast and reliable reports from 5+ data sources and 5k+ entries to aid stakeholders in making decisions.
